scripts.build:assets: rm -rf assets && vite build --config src/assets/yoastseo/vite.config.js && vite build --config src/assets/worker/vite.config.js
scripts.build:playground: PLAYGROUND=true pnpm run build && pnpm run build:assets
scripts.build:zero-one: ZERO_ONE=true pnpm run build && pnpm run build:assets && node scripts/build-zero-one.mjs
scripts.extract:messages: node scripts/extract-translations.mjs && npx po2json messages.pot messages.json --format jed1.x --domain wordpress-seo && sed -i '' 's/"wordpress-seo\\u0004/"/g' messages.json
scripts.release: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:assets && bumpp --all --execute "npx zx scripts/pre-release.mjs" && zx scripts/post-release.mjs
